title: QA Suite
description: Schema for HydReq YAML API test suites. This powers editor completions, hover docs, and validation.

name.description: Human-readable suite name shown in UI and reports.

baseUrl.description: Base URL used to join with request.url path (e.g., https://api.example.com). Supports ${ENV:VAR} and ${var}.

vars.description: String variables available for interpolation throughout the suite.

auth.description: Suite-level authentication helpers sourced from environment variables.

bearerEnv.description: Name of env var that contains a Bearer token (e.g., DEMO_BEARER).

basicEnv.description: Name of env var that contains a Base64 Basic token (e.g., BASIC_B64).

openApi.description: Options for validating requests/responses against an OpenAPI 3.x spec.

file.description: Path to an OpenAPI spec file (YAML or JSON).

enabled.description: Enable OpenAPI-aware validation for this suite.

preSuite.description: Hooks that run once before all tests in this suite.

postSuite.description: Hooks that run once after all tests in this suite.

tests.description: List of test cases to execute. Use stage/dependsOn to control ordering.

hooks.description: Sequence of hook steps. Each step may issue an HTTP request with asserts/extract or run a SQL query with extract.

hook.description: Reusable step executed before/after a suite or test.

name.description: Optional label for this hook step.

vars.description: Variables set/overridden for the duration of this hook.

request.description: HTTP request to perform in this hook.

assert.description: Assertions evaluated against the hook response.

extract.description: Extract values from response JSON into variables.

sql.description: Execute a SQL query and optionally extract column values into variables.

dsn.description: Connection string/DSN for the selected driver.

extract.description: Map variable name to column name for extraction.

testCase.description: A single test case with request, assertions, and optional hooks/extracts.

name.description: Unique test name within the suite.

extract.description: Extract response fields to variables for later use.

only.description: If true, only run this test (and other 'only' tests).

repeat.description: Run this test multiple times (use with caution).

tags.description: Labels for filtering runs (e.g., smoke, slow).

retry.description: Retry policy for this test (applies to failed assertions or errors).

backoffMs.description: Base backoff in milliseconds between retries.

jitterPct.description: Randomized jitter percentage to add/subtract from backoff.

stage.description: Execution stage. Tests with the same stage run in parallel; higher stages run later.

matrix.description: Data-driven expansion. Each key is a var; values are arrays combined into cartesian test permutations.

dependsOn.description: List of test names this test depends on (transitive).

pre.description: Hooks to run before this test.

post.description: Hooks to run after this test.

enabled.description: Enable/disable OpenAPI validation for this test.

request.description: HTTP request definition. The url is a path joined with suite baseUrl.

url.description: Path or relative URL (e.g., /users/123). Joined with baseUrl.

body.description: Request body. Supports object, array, or string; interpolations allowed.

assertions.description: Assertions evaluated against the HTTP response.

headerEquals.description: Exact match of selected response headers.

jsonContains.description: JSON path contains substring or value (path: expectedSubstrOrValue).

bodyContains.description: Body must contain all of the listed substrings.

maxDurationMs.description: Response must complete within this many milliseconds.

extract.description: Extract variables from a response using JSONPath-like selectors.

jsonPath.description: Path to the value in the JSON response (e.g., data.id).
